import Like from '../Admin/AdminHome/imgs/Like.png'; import Dislike from '../Admin/AdminHome/imgs/Dislike.png'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card'; function CommentCard(props) { return <> {/*


{props.comment.CandidateName}
{props.comment.Comment}
By {props.comment.Commenter}{" "} - {props.comment.DateTime}


{' '}{' '} {props.comment.Like}
{' '} {" "}{props.comment.Dislike}








*/}
{/* Featured */} {props.comment.CandidateName} With supporting text below as a natural lead-in to additional content. 2 days ago


} export default CommentCard;
